trans-unit.source: Contains policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: 包含原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> class to group together policy assertions and to enumerate or modify a group of assertions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> 類別將原則判斷提示組成群組，並列舉或修改判斷提示的群組。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> is used most frequently as a return value for the methods of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection> 最常用來做為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> 類別的方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The policy assertions the collection is to contain.
trans-unit.target: 集合要包含的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyAssertionCollection" /> 物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection contains the specified policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出集合是否包含指定的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the specified policy assertion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合包含指定的原則判斷提示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: The specified policy assertion, or <see langword="null" /> if the assertion cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 指定的原則判斷提示，如果找不到判斷提示則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Returns all specified policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回所有指定的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all policy assertions that match the specification, or an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 符合規格的所有原則判斷提示的集合，或空集合。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to insert <c>item</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要插入 <c>item</c> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The policy assertion to insert at <c>index</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>index</c> 插入的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: The assertion must not be null.
trans-unit.target: 判斷提示不得為 null。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a specified policy assertion into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的原則判斷提示插入集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified policy assertion from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除指定的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: The policy assertion that was removed from the collection or <see langword="null" /> if the policy assertion was not in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合移除的原則判斷提示，如果原則判斷提示不在集合中則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的本機名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Removes all policy assertions that match the specified name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有符合指定的名稱和命名空間的原則判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: A collection of all removed policy assertions or an empty collection if no assertions were found that match the specified name and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 所有移除的原則判斷提示的集合，如果找不到符合指定名稱和命名空間的判斷提示則為空集合。

trans-unit.source: The index that contains the assertion to replace.
trans-unit.target: 包含要取代的判斷提示的索引。

trans-unit.source: The policy assertion to replace the assertion already at <c>index</c>.
trans-unit.target: 原則判斷提示，要用來取代已經在 <c>index</c> 的判斷提示。

trans-unit.source: The assertion must not be null.
trans-unit.target: 判斷提示不得為 null。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the policy assertion at a specified index with a specified policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的原則判斷提示來取代指定索引處的原則判斷提示。
